metadata.name: Croquette & Empanada
metadata.description: Croquette is looking for love—his sweet, silly other half.  Empanada hopes she can find someone who accepts her for who she is. It's a match made in tasty, tasty heaven. Internationally bestselling author Ana Oncina's Croquette & Empanada explores modern love and domesticity with charming comics. Enjoy the antics of this adorable, culinary couple as they navigate romance and cohabitation, from deciding to move in together to purchasing their first pet.
